item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Cody. I’m a Senior Software Engineer at Meltano. Before joining Meltano, I worked as a Systems Engineer at PEAK6 Investments, as a Senior Data Engineer at Arrive in Chicago, and as a Senior data engineer at Sprout Social in Chicago. Prior to becoming an engineer, I attended the University of Chicago as an Odyssey Scholar. During my time at UChicago, I worked as a tutor in the Computer Science Instructional Laboratories where I led a small team of students who managed all of the labs’ operations.
